MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G3 postcode area of Glasgow, affecting properties in St Georges Road. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 9pm due to an underground cable fault and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:36pm on Monday, 15 February 2021
